channel.title: Doubling Down on Betting On Success
channel.description: Recent content in Doubling Down on Betting On Success

item.title: Doubling Down
item.description: Doubling Down is a move in Blackjack where you can double your original bet when you have a good hand so you can make even more money. I feel like this is a fitting post. In 2018, Mr and Mrs. BoS are Doubling Down on a some things while quitting others. Removing Selling Fix and Flip that is currently rented Finishing 3+ year IT contract job Other investments etc Doubling Down
